motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • January 22, 2024 City Council special called meeting minutes • On-call skilled trade vendors • Resolution appointing a member to serve on the Board of Ethics

motions.title: Resolution to Return Text Amendment to Planning Commission
motions.description: Resolution to return text amendment to define community residences and recovery communities and create use regulations to the Planning Commission.

motions.title: Resolution Extending Moratorium on Drug Rehabilitation Centers
motions.description: Resolution extending moratorium on drug rehabilitation centers and other facilities for treatment of drug dependency.
